Packager Size: W140*H150 MM Voltage: 220V50HZ Power: 370 W Carton Sealers A sealing machine is a machine for sealing a container filled with a package. Shrink Packaging Machine The shrink packaging is the process of shrinking, does not affect the quality of the package, it can shrink quickly and perfectly. The packaged product can be sealed, moisture-proof, impact-proof, suitable for tight packaging of multiple articles and tray packaging. Vacuum Packing Machine The vacuum packaging machine is placed in the package of the packaged object through the suction nozzle, evacuates the air, exits the suction nozzle, and then completes the sealing. Film Wrapper Machine This type of packaging machine has the functions of forming, filling and sealing. Here are some simple steps on how to use pizza ovens:1. Clear the oven. Make sure the pizza stone or S/S chain is clean. This is the basic of baking, and indispensable to ensure that you bake hygienic, healthy, and delicious pizzas.2. Always pre-heat the oven. Before you put the pizza dough and pie into the oven, let the oven heat for some time, and set the temperature to around 350\u00b0C.3. When the oven reaches the set temperature, the next step depends on the type of oven you are using. a. For deck pizza ovens: Open the door and put the pizza oven + pizza pie inside, be careful while operating as the temperature inside is very high. It\u2019s advisable to use a pizza tool and wear long-sleeve clothes. b. For conveyor pizza ovens: Put the pizza oven and pizza pie from one side, and adjust the transmission speed to adequate time.4. Wait for 4-5 minutes, and your delicious and perfect pizza is done.WarrantyOur commercial ovens come with a 1-year warranty. It should be in a proper temperature that should be not very cold for ice cream (it can become very hard) and not very warm (as it will start to melt).Ice cream is commonly made of fruits, milk, sugar, artificial flavor, nuts and chocolates. It shows a steady growth trend of presents a broad market prospect.", "items": {"10L Pedal Control Commercial Vertical Electric Sausage Stuffer TT-F810": {"name": "10L Pedal Control Commercial Vertical Electric Sausage Stuffer TT-F810", "link": "https://www.twothousand.com/10l-pedal-control-commercial-vertical-electric-sausage-stuffer-tt-f810", "data": "Electric Sausage Filler | Pedal Control Model: TT-F810 Volume: 10 L Cylinder Size: \u03a6220x280 MM Power: 25 W Voltage: 220V50Hz/110V60Hz Size: 420x330x650 MM Weight: 27 KG Material: Full Stainless Steel Body Stainless Steel Outlet: 4 Sizes Outlet ( \u03a619MM; \u03a625MM; \u03a638MM; \u03a642MM ) Note: 2 types ( TYPE A / TYPE C ) you can choose INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Put the pedal on the dry floor. 2. Plug in power and the press the red button to \u201cON\u201d. 3. Press the black direct-reverse switch on Up position to make the piston move to the top. 4. Take out the barrel out and put the stuffing into the barrel. 5. Put the barrel back to the machine. 6. Press the black direct-reverse switch on Down position and use a foot to tread the pedal. The piston moves down. 7. If the moving speed of the piston is too fast or too slow, the speed button can be pressed to adjust suitable speed. 8. In the process of clyster, if the piston need to be stopped moving down, just move the foot from the pedal. 9. When piston moves to the bottom of the barrel, the machine stops automatically. When the fillings are used out, press the black direct-reverse switch to UP and then the piston moves to the top. 10. If a new sausage need to be filled, please repeat the operations above. CLEANING METHOD 1. Disconnect the power of machine before cleaning. 2. Take down the barrel, the piston and the meat tube from the machine. Clean them in the clean water with washing-up liquid by using hands. Dry them after cleaning. 3. Clean up the machine body with wet cloth. Put the pedal on the dry floor. 2. Plug in power and the press the red button to \u201cON\u201d. 3. Press the black direct-reverse switch on Up position to make the piston move to the top. 4. Take out the barrel out and put the stuffing into the barrel. 5. Put the barrel back to the machine. 6. Press the black direct-reverse switch on Down position and use a foot to tread the pedal. The piston moves down. 7. If the moving speed of the piston is too fast or too slow, the speed button can be pressed to adjust suitable speed. 8. In the process of clyster, if the piston need to be stopped moving down, just move the foot from the pedal. 9. When piston moves to the bottom of the barrel, the machine stops automatically. When the fillings are used out, press the black direct-reverse switch to UP and then the piston moves to the top. 10. If a new sausage need to be filled, please repeat the operations above. Twothousand Machinery will offer not only the best mixers but also the best service.\u00a0Having Trouble Choosing a Suitable Mixing Agitator?> \u00a0Commercial mixers can be used to mix many kinds of things, and hence, choosing the right type is very important. Even if you are unsure about how to choose a suitable mixing agitator, there is no need for you to worry, for we are here to help!> \u00a0Broadly classifying, there are three types of mixers. If you want to mix large things such as dough etc., then you can choose dough hook. Racket shape mixing agitator is for bulking things, such as meat dumpling stuffing etc. If the task is to mix unsticking or little sticking things, such as eggs and creams, you can choose net shape mixing agitator, also called beater.> \u00a0These three types of agitators have their own features, and hence, are used for different applications. Furthermore, cooking should also be done in a way that will be cost effective and would not take away much of your cost. For instance- electric cooking measures can bring a hefty amount of electric bill for your venture at the end of the month.There are two types of tandoor ovens that you can generally find in the market. One is the electric tandoor oven whereas the other one is gas tandoor oven. Electric tandoor ovens take up electricity as its primary power source and hence it is a bit costly method than the other one available.
